# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="dd097-102">Fout 550/553 in Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dd097-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dd097-103">Wanneer u niet thuis bent en een e-mailbericht verzenden vanuit uw verbonden met Outlook.com-account, kan uw e-mailbericht met een 550 of 553 relay verboden foutbericht worden geretourneerd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dd097-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="dd097-104">Controleer uw [synchronisatie-instellingen voor e-mail](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) op **Instellingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dd097-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="dd097-105">> **Bekijk alle Outlook-instellingen** > **e** > **e-mail synchroniseren**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dd097-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="dd097-106">Zorg ervoor dat uw standaard verzendadres is hetzelfde als de domeinnaam voor uw e-mailadres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dd097-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="dd097-107">Als u uw eigen e-maildomein opgenomen hebt, kunt u deze naar outlook.com, live.com of hotmail.com adres wijzigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dd097-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
